00001 #!/usr/bin/env python
00002 
00003 import roslib
00004 import sys
00005 import rospy
00006 import numpy as np
00007 from uav_utils import ThermalRise
00008 from mathutils import saturation, quat2Reb
00009 from math import floor, exp
00010 from last_letter.msg import SimStates, SimBarometer, Environment
00011 
00012 _grav=9.81
00013 
00014 #######################  Barometer Class  #########################################################
00015 
00016 class Barometer():
00017         def __init__(self,name):
00018                 
00019                 rospy.loginfo('Create ' + name +' Sensor')
00020                 
00021                 self.dt = 1.0/rospy.get_param(name+'/rate', 100.0)
00022                 self.rate =  rospy.Rate(rospy.get_param(name+'/rate', 100.0))
00023                 rospy.loginfo("\ta.rate: %.1f Hz",1.0/self.dt)
00024 
00025                 self.cp =  np.array(rospy.get_param(name+'/CP', [0.0, 0.0, 0.0])).reshape(3,1)
00026                 rospy.loginfo("\tb.position: [%.2f,%.2f,%.2f]", self.cp[0],self.cp[1],self.cp[2])
00027 
00028                 self.resolution = rospy.get_param(name+'/resolution', 0.001)
00029                 rospy.loginfo("\tc.resolution: %.1e mbar",self.resolution)
00030 
00031                 self.maxvalue = rospy.get_param(name+'/max', 1500.0)
00032                 rospy.loginfo("\td.maxvalue: %.4f mbar",self.maxvalue)
00033 
00034                 self.minvalue = rospy.get_param(name+'/min', 0.0)
00035                 rospy.loginfo("\te.minvalue: %.4f mbar",self.minvalue)
00036 
00037                 self.std_coeff = rospy.get_param(name+'/std_coeff', 0.1)
00038                 rospy.loginfo("\tf.noise coeff: %.3f",self.std_coeff)
00039 
00040                 self.bar_true=1013.25
00041                 self.temp=25.0
00042 
00043                 self.pub = rospy.Publisher(name, SimBarometer)
00044                 self.states_sub = rospy.Subscriber("states",SimStates,self.StatesCallback)
00045                 self.atm_sub = rospy.Subscriber("environment",Environment,self.EnvironmentCallback)
00046 
00047                 self.measurement = SimBarometer()
00048                 self.realnew=False
00049                 
00050                 #Thermal Chracteristics
00051                 self.thermalMass = ThermalRise(name)    
00052                 rospy.loginfo("\tg.Loading Thermal Chracteristics")
00053                 self.airspeed = 0.0
00054                 self.temp=25.0
00055 
00056         def iterate(self,states):
00057                 Reb = quat2Reb(states.pose.orientation)
00058                 bar_noise = np.random.normal(0,self.std_coeff,1)
00059                 barpos = states.pose.position.z+np.dot(Reb[2][0:3],self.cp)
00060                 
00061                 self.measurement.pressure = self.bar_true
00062                 self.measurement.pressure = saturation(floor(self.measurement.pressure/self.resolution)*self.resolution,self.minvalue, self.maxvalue)
00063 
00064                 self.tempOffset = self.thermalMass.step(self.airspeed,self.dt)
00065                 self.measurement.temperature = self.temp + self.tempOffset
00066 
00067 
00068         def StatesCallback(self,data):
00069                 self.real=data
00070                 self.realnew=True
00071 
00072         def EnvironmentCallback(self,data):
00073                 self.bar_true=data.pressure
00074                 self.grav=data.gravity
00075                 self.temp=data.temperature
00076                 if self.realnew:
00077                         self.airspeed = np.sqrt(pow(self.real.velocity.linear.x - data.wind.x,2) + pow(self.real.velocity.linear.y - data.wind.y,2) + pow(self.real.velocity.linear.z - data.wind.z,2))
00078                         
00079 
00080 ###################################################################################################     
00081 #######################  Main Program  ############################################################
00082 ###################################################################################################     
00083 if __name__ == '__main__':
00084         rospy.init_node('bar_model')
00085 
00086         fullname = rospy.get_name().split('/')
00087         bar = Barometer(fullname[-1])
00088 
00089         while not rospy.is_shutdown():
00090                 if bar.realnew:
00091                         bar.realnew=False
00092                         bar.iterate(bar.real)
00093                         bar.measurement.header.stamp=rospy.Time.now()
00094                 bar.pub.publish(bar.measurement)
00095                 bar.rate.sleep()
